info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 24 at 6:12PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Valley County through 715 PM MDT... At 612 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles northeast of Hinsdale, or 28 miles northwest of Glasgow, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Opheim, Port Of Opheim, Hinsdale and Thoeny. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
